trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around December 2nd 2012
divs: sighting detailsi woke up from a nap around 1pm, checked my window outside to see if it was still raining (i live on the 10th floor of this complex) and i see a round\ circular silver object fly into the clouds (faster than an airplane) i thought maybe it was a bird and i was trippin, but then another one followed it in the same speed and direction. it was odd.
Summary: 2 round, quick, swift, silvery/white (faster than a plane) flying ojects flying into clouds
